ToursByLocals - Full Stack Engineer - Remote - 75-150k

ToursByLocals is one of the top destinations for travellers looking to get a private tour from an actual local tour guide from the area. We recently launched our new site and we are looking for a few more talented people to join our team to continue to make it better and launch new features our travellers, tour guides and travel agents will love. Our tech stack includes: Node, TypeScript, NextJS & NestJS, React, GraphQL, MongoDB.

I am hiring for early career, intermediate and senior level roles, when you apply let us know which role you are interested in.
